ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T15:43:22 [Issue ID 4000-175437] urn:comicvine:4000-175437 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 11:00:12. [Issue ID 271610]
ComicInfo.Summary: While running from the Dark Troll Luse rounds a corner to see Mogre-Ur. Mogre-Ur is believed to be the oldest most powerful elf alive. Mogre-Ur help Luse fight off the troll while Jace and Cleah are being guarded by elven troops. They escape the guards and head to help Luse. They arrive just in time to see Luse get knocked out and Mogre-Ur pop the trolls head off. Luse awakens to Parintachin who has had a little company...Petunia!
ComicInfo.Title: The Worm, The Wizard, The Solider, The Rake...
